column4: Trying to install twonky but get told i dont have permission to create folder-HELP
sudo it
this may seem dense but how do i sudo it, i do cd desktop then sudo and the full file name but it says invalid command
what are you doing exactly?
trying to install twonky media server
do you know how to do that?
no i dont
as in have you read the documentation or whatever else exists that tells you. Is there an INSTALL file or a README
yes it is the install file im trying to execute. The documentation says just double click after making the file executable
but it tells me i dont have permission grr
by INSTALL file I mean a text file literally called "INSTALL" but ok, it says to make a particular file executable, what is the name of that file?
twonkymedia-i386-glib-2.2.5.sh
ok cd into the directory with that and do this: chmod +x twonkymedia-i386-glib-2.2.5.sh && ./twonkymedia-i386-glib-2.2.5.sh
one second
get this message: mkdir: cannot create directory '/usr/local/TwonkyVision': Permission denied
if you copy and pasted that command I gave you, it should not give you that message
I used this command: chmod +x twonkymedia-i386-glib-2.2.5.sh && ./twonkymedia-i386-glib-2.2.5.sh
woops chmod +x twonkymedia-i386-glib-2.2.5.sh && sudo ./twonkymedia-i386-glib-2.2.5.sh
lol one sec
ok looks like it worked THANKS a bundle, now i just need to establish how i convert .avi to .wmc
